statements: DELETE FROM match_results WHERE team1_name = 'Real Madrid' AND team2_name = 'Barcelona'
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 1 AND match_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE team1_name = 'Real Madrid' AND team2_name = 'Barcelona';
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 100 AND winner = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM match_statistics WHERE total_shots > 15 AND fouls < 5;
DELETE FROM MatchResults WHERE match_id = 100 AND winner_id = 10;
DELETE FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE player_id = 20 AND wins >= 5;
DELETE FROM Players WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United';
